message: Let's split it evenly to start. Fair play!
Let's be practical, Alice. The clock is ticking, and this money is losing value fast. I'll take a bit more to offset the loss.
I'm willing to give you a little more to close this deal, but I'm not going to lose out on a significant portion of my share. Let's get this done.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  The value is slipping away with each round. Take this deal so we can both walk away with something.
